roleset.name: win over some competitor
roleset.note: TROUNCE-V NOTES: frame by Perryn. No Vncls. Updated by Julia, 11/2010. (from trounce.01-v)

example.name: election
example.text: [The 72-year-old leader of the right wing Likud Party]-1 is expected *-1 to trounce Ehud Barak in the upcoming election for Prime Minister.
example.arg: in the upcoming election for Prime Minister
